query.value:
<fetch>
  <entity name="ww_prebottlinganalysis">
    <all-attributes />
    <filter type="and">
      <condition attribute="ww_tankerlookup" operator="not-null" />
      <condition attribute="modifiedon" operator="gt" value="@{activity('Last modifiedon').output.firstRow.last_modifiedon}" />
    </filter>
  </entity>
</fetch>

body.Subject: An error has occurred!
body.ErrorMessage: The ADF pipeline has crashed! Please check the logs.

body.Subject: An error has occurred!
body.ErrorMessage: The ADF pipeline has crashed! Please check the logs.

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT coalesce(MAX(CAST(SWITCHOFFSET(modifiedon, -DATEPART(TZOFFSET, modifiedon AT TIME ZONE 'New Zealand Standard Time')) AS DATETIME)),'2018-01-01') AS last_modifiedon
FROM [Dataverse].[dbo].[ww_prebottlinganalysis];

query.value:
<fetch xmlns:generator="MarkMpn.SQL4CDS">
  <entity name="ww_supervisorsignoffbomhourlycheck">
    <all-attributes />
    <filter type="and">
      
      <condition attribute="ww_billofmaterials" operator="not-null" />
     
      <condition attribute="modifiedon" operator="gt" value="@{activity('Last modifiedon').output.firstRow.last_modifiedon}" />
    </filter>
  </entity>
</fetch>
